title: Homework Wars: How to Stop the Arguments?
excerpt: Tips for creating a calm learning environment and a fixed routine that will prevent evening shouting.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
Set a Fixed Time

Uncertainty creates resistance. When the child knows that at 4:00 PM it's homework time, the argument is avoided.

A Quiet and Organized Space

Without the TV on and without a phone. A quiet environment encourages concentration and shortens work time.
